trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Get-Process
trans-unit.target: Get-Process

trans-unit.source: Get-Process
trans-unit.target: Get-Process

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Gets the processes that are running on the local computer or a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 取得在本機電腦或遠端電腦上執行的處理程序。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: Name (Default)
trans-unit.target: 名稱 （預設值）

trans-unit.source: NameWithUserName
trans-unit.target: NameWithUserName

trans-unit.source: IdWithUserName
trans-unit.target: IdWithUserName

trans-unit.source: Id
trans-unit.target: Id

trans-unit.source: InputObjectWithUserName
trans-unit.target: InputObjectWithUserName

trans-unit.source: InputObject
trans-unit.target: InputObject

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The **Get-Process** cmdlet gets the processes on a local or remote computer.
trans-unit.target: **Get-process** cmdlet 取得本機或遠端電腦上的處理程序。

trans-unit.source: Without parameters, this cmdlet gets all of the processes on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有參數，此 cmdlet 會取得所有的處理序在本機電腦上。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify a particular process by process name or process ID (PID) or pass a process object through the pipeline to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以指定特定的處理序的處理序名稱或處理序識別碼 (PID)，或處理程序物件透過管線傳遞至這個指令程式。

trans-unit.source: By default, this cmdlet returns a process object that has detailed information about the process and supports methods that let you start and stop the process.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此 cmdlet 會傳回處理程序物件，詳細的程序的詳細資訊，並支援這些方法可讓您啟動及停止程序。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the parameters of the **Get-Process** cmdlet to get file version information for the program that runs in the process and to get the modules that the process loaded.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用的參數 **Get-process** cmdlet 取得檔案版本資訊的程序中執行的程式，並取得處理序所載入的模組。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Get a list of all active processes on the local computer
trans-unit.target: 範例 1︰ 取得本機電腦上的所有作用中處理序清單

trans-unit.source: This command gets a list of all active processes running on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會取得本機電腦上執行的所有作用中處理序的清單。

trans-unit.source: For a definition of each column, see the "Additional Notes" section of the Help topic for Get-Help.
trans-unit.target: 如需每一欄的定義，請參閱 Get-Help 之說明主題的＜其他附註＞一節。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Get all available data about one or more processes
trans-unit.target: 範例 2︰ 取得一個或多個處理程序相關的所有可用資料

trans-unit.source: This command gets all available data about the Winword and Explorer processes on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令取得電腦上 Winword 和 Explorer 處理程序的所有可用相關資料。

trans-unit.source: It uses the *Name* parameter to specify the processes, but it omits the optional parameter name.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用 *名稱* 參數來指定處理程序，但會省略選擇性參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: The pipeline operator (|) passes the data to the Format-List cmdlet, which displays all available properties (*) of the Winword and Explorer process objects.
trans-unit.target: 管線運算子 (|) 會將資料傳遞至 Format-List Cmdlet，這會顯示 Winword 和 Explorer 處理程序物件的所有可用屬性 (*)。

trans-unit.source: You can also identify the processes by their process IDs.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以依處理程序識別碼來識別處理程序。

trans-unit.source: For instance, `Get-Process -Id 664, 2060`.
trans-unit.target: 比方說， `Get-Process -Id 664, 2060`。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Get all processes with a working set greater than a specified size
trans-unit.target: 範例 3︰ 取得所有處理程序與工作集大於指定的大小

trans-unit.source: This command gets all processes that have a working set greater than 20 MB.
trans-unit.target: 此命令取得工作集大於 20 MB 的所有處理程序。

trans-unit.source: It uses the **Get-Process** cmdlet to get all running processes.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用 **Get-process** cmdlet 來取得所有執行中處理序。

trans-unit.source: The pipeline operator (|) passes the process objects to the Where-Object cmdlet, which selects only the object with a value greater than 20,000,000 bytes for the **WorkingSet** property.
trans-unit.target: 管線運算子 (|) 將處理程序物件傳遞 Where-object 指令程式，會選取的物件使用的值大於 20000000 個位元組 **WorkingSet** 屬性。

trans-unit.source: **WorkingSet** is one of many properties of process objects.
trans-unit.target: **WorkingSet** 是其中一個處理程序物件的多個屬性。

trans-unit.source: To see all of the properties, type `Get-Process | Get-Member`.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看所有內容，請輸入 `Get-Process | Get-Member`。

trans-unit.source: By default, the values of all amount properties are in bytes, even though the default display lists them in kilobytes and megabytes.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，所有數量屬性都是以位元組為單位，即使預設顯示是以 KB 和 MB 來列示它們。

trans-unit.source: Example 4: List processes on the computer in groups based on priority
trans-unit.target: 範例 4︰ 列出根據優先順序的群組中電腦上的處理程序

trans-unit.source: These commands list the processes on the computer in groups based on their priority class.
trans-unit.target: 這些命令會列出優先順序類別為基礎的群組中的電腦上的處理序。

trans-unit.source: The first command gets all the processes on the computer and then stores them in the $A variable.
trans-unit.target: 第一個命令取得電腦上的所有處理程序，然後將它們儲存在 $A 變數。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses the *InputObject* parameter to pass the process objects that are stored in the $A variable to the **Get-Process** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 第二個命令會使用 *InputObject* $A 變數中儲存的程序物件傳遞至參數 **Get-process** 指令程式。

trans-unit.source: The pipeline operator passes the objects to the **Format-Table** cmdlet, which formats the processes by using the Priority view.
trans-unit.target: 管線運算子將物件傳入 **Format-table** 指令程式，以使用 Priority 檢視來格式化程序。

trans-unit.source: The Priority view, and other views, are defined in the PS1XML format files in the Windows PowerShell home directory ($pshome).
trans-unit.target: Priority 檢視及其他檢視是在 Windows PowerShell 主目錄 ($pshome) 的 PS1XML 格式檔案中定義。

trans-unit.source: Example 5: Add a property to the standard Get-Process output display
trans-unit.target: 範例 5︰ 將屬性加入至標準 Get-process 輸出顯示

trans-unit.source: This example provides a **Format-Table** (alias = ft) command that adds the **MachineName** property to the standard **Get-Process** output display.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例提供 **Format-table** （別名 = ft） 命令，將 **MachineName** 標準屬性 **Get-process** 輸出顯示。

trans-unit.source: Example 6: Get version information for a process
trans-unit.target: 範例 6︰ 取得處理程序的版本資訊

trans-unit.source: This command uses the *FileVersionInfo* parameter to get the version information for the PowerShell.exe file that is the main module for the PowerShell process.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用 *FileVersionInfo* 參數，以取得 PowerShell.exe 的版本資訊也就是檔案的 PowerShell 處理程序的主要模組。

trans-unit.source: To run this command with processes that you do not own on Windows Vista and later versions of Windows, you must open Windows PowerShell with the Run as administrator option.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此命令不是您擁有的處理程序，Windows Vista 和更新版本的 Windows 上，您必須開啟與執行 Windows PowerShell 系統管理員身分。

trans-unit.source: Example 7: Get modules loaded with the specified process
trans-unit.target: 範例 7︰ 取得與指定的處理序所載入的模組

trans-unit.source: This command uses the *Module* parameter to get the modules that have been loaded by the process.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用 *模組* 參數，以取得處理程序所載入的模組。

trans-unit.source: This command gets the modules for the processes that have names that begin with SQL.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會取得名稱開頭為 SQL 處理程序的模組。

trans-unit.source: To run this command on Windows Vista and later versions of Windows with processes that you do not own, you must start Windows PowerShell with the Run as administrator option.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此命令在 Windows Vista 和更新版本的 Windows 不是您擁有的處理程序，您必須啟動與執行 Windows PowerShell 為系統管理員] 選項。

trans-unit.source: Example 8: Find the owner of a process
trans-unit.target: 範例 8︰ 尋找處理程序的擁有者

trans-unit.source: This command shows how to find the owner of a process.
trans-unit.target: 此命令示範如何尋找處理程序的擁有者。

trans-unit.source: Because the **System.Diagnostics.Process** object that **Get-Process** returns does not have a property or method that returns the process owner, the command uses the Get-WmiObject cmdlet to get a Win32_Process object that represents the same process.
trans-unit.target: 因為 **System.Diagnostics.Process** 物件 **Get-process** 傳回沒有屬性或方法會傳回處理序擁有者，此命令使用 Get-wmiobject cmdlet 取得代表相同的程序的 Win32_Process 物件。

trans-unit.source: The first command uses **Get-WmiObject** to get the PowerShell process.
trans-unit.target: 第一個命令使用 **Get-wmiobject** 取得 PowerShell 處理程序。

trans-unit.source: It saves it in the $P variable.
trans-unit.target: 它儲存在 $P 變數中。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses the **GetOwner** method to get the owner of the process in $P.
trans-unit.target: 第二個命令會使用 **GetOwner** 方法來取得 $P.程序的擁有者

trans-unit.source: The command reveals that the owner is Domain01\user01.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會顯示擁有者是 Domain01\user01。

trans-unit.source: Example 9: Use an automatic variable to identify the process hosting the current session
trans-unit.target: 範例 9︰ 使用自動變數來識別裝載目前工作階段的處理序

trans-unit.source: These commands show how to use the $pid automatic variable to identify the process that is hosting the current Windows PowerShell session.
trans-unit.target: 這些命令示範如何使用 $pid 自動變數來識別裝載目前 Windows PowerShell 工作階段的處理程序。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to distinguish the host process from other Windows PowerShell processes that you might want to stop or close.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法區別該主機處理程序與其他您可能想要停止或關閉的 Windows PowerShell 處理程序。

trans-unit.source: The first command gets all of the Windows PowerShell processes in the current session.
trans-unit.target: 第一個命令取得目前工作階段中的所有 Windows PowerShell 處理程序。

trans-unit.source: The second command gets the Windows PowerShell process that is hosting the current session.
trans-unit.target: 第二個命令取得裝載目前工作階段的 Windows PowerShell 處理程序。

trans-unit.source: Example 10: Get all processes that have a main window title and display them in a table
trans-unit.target: 範例 10︰ 取得擁有主視窗標題並將它們顯示在資料表中的所有處理序

trans-unit.source: This command gets all the processes that have a main window title, and it displays them in a table with the process ID and the process name.
trans-unit.target: 此命令取得具有主視窗標題的所有處理程序，並將它們顯示在含有處理程序識別碼和處理程序名稱的表格中。

trans-unit.source: The **mainWindowTitle** property is just one of many useful properties of the **Process** object that **Get-Process** returns.
trans-unit.target: **MainWindowTitle** 屬性只是眾多實用屬性之一 **程序** 物件 **Get-process** 傳回。

trans-unit.source: To view all of the properties, pipe the results of a **Get-Process** command to the Get-Member cmdlet (get-process | get-member).
trans-unit.target: 若要檢視的所有屬性，透過管道傳送結果的 **Get-process** Get-member 指令程式的命令 (get 程序 | get 成員)。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -ComputerName
trans-unit.target: -ComputerName

trans-unit.source: Specifies the computers for which this cmdlet gets active processes.
trans-unit.target: 指定的電腦，此 cmdlet 會取得使用中處理序。

trans-unit.source: The default is the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 預設是本機電腦。

trans-unit.source: Type the NetBIOS name, an IP address, or a fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of one or more computers.
trans-unit.target: 輸入 NetBIOS 名稱、 IP 位址或一個或多部電腦的完整的網域名稱 (FQDN)。

trans-unit.source: To specify the local computer, type the computer name, a dot (.), or localhost.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定本機電腦，請輸入電腦名稱、 句點 （.） 或 localhost。

trans-unit.source: This parameter does not rely on Windows PowerShell remoting.
trans-unit.target: 此參數不必依賴 Windows PowerShell 遠端功能。

trans-unit.source: You can use the *ComputerName* parameter of this cmdlet even if your computer is not configured to run remote commands.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 *ComputerName* 這個指令程式即使您的電腦未設定為執行遠端命令的參數。

trans-unit.source: -FileVersionInfo
trans-unit.target: -FileVersionInfo

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets the file version information for the program that runs in the process.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得處理序中執行之程式的檔案版本資訊。

trans-unit.source: On Windows Vista and later versions of Windows, you must open Windows PowerShell with the Run as administrator option to use this parameter on processes that you do not own.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Vista 和更新版本的 Windows，您必須開啟 Windows PowerShell 中使用 「 執行做為系統管理員才能使用這個參數不是您擁有的處理程序上的選項。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use the *FileVersionInfo* and *ComputerName* parameters of the **Get-Process** cmdlet in the same command.
trans-unit.target: 您不能使用 *FileVersionInfo* 和 *ComputerName* 參數 **Get-process** 指令程式在相同的命令。

trans-unit.source: To get file version information for a process on a remote computer, use the Invoke-Command cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得處理序的遠端電腦上的檔案版本資訊，請使用 Invoke-command cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: Using this parameter is equivalent to getting the **MainModule.FileVersionInfo** property of each process object.
trans-unit.target: 使用此參數相當於取得 **MainModule.FileVersionInfo** 每個處理程序物件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: When you use this parameter, **Get-Process** returns a **FileVersionInfo** object (System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo), not a process object.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用這個參數， **Get-process** 傳回 **FileVersionInfo** 物件 (System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo)，而不是程序物件。

trans-unit.source: So, you cannot pipe the output of the command to a cmdlet that expects a process object, such as Stop-Process.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您無法使用管線將命令的輸出傳送給預期取得處理程序物件的 Cmdlet，例如 Stop-Process。

trans-unit.source: -Id
trans-unit.target: 識別碼

trans-unit.source: Specifies one or more processes by process ID (PID).
trans-unit.target: 依處理程序識別碼 (PID) 指定一個或多個處理程序。

trans-unit.source: To specify multiple IDs, use commas to separate the IDs.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定多個識別碼，請使用逗號來分隔識別碼。

trans-unit.source: To find the PID of a process, type `Get-Process`.
trans-unit.target: 若要尋找處理程序的 PID，請輸入 `Get-Process`。

trans-unit.source: -IncludeUserName
trans-unit.target: -IncludeUserName

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the UserName value of the **Process** object is returned with results of the command.
trans-unit.target: 表示的使用者名稱值 **程序** 物件會傳回命令的結果。

trans-unit.source: -InputObject
trans-unit.target: -InputObject

trans-unit.source: Specifies one or more process objects.
trans-unit.target: 指定一個或多個處理程序物件。

trans-unit.source: Enter a variable that contains the objects, or type a command or expression that gets the objects.
trans-unit.target: 輸入包含物件的變數，或輸入可取得物件的命令或運算式。

trans-unit.source: -Module
trans-unit.target: 模組

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets the modules that have been loaded by the processes.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得處理程序所載入的模組。

trans-unit.source: On Windows Vista and later versions of Windows, you must open Windows PowerShell with the Run as administrator option to use this parameter on processes that you do not own.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Vista 和更新版本的 Windows，您必須開啟 Windows PowerShell 中使用 「 執行做為系統管理員才能使用這個參數不是您擁有的處理程序上的選項。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use the *Module* and *ComputerName* parameters of the **Get-Process** cmdlet in the same command.
trans-unit.target: 您不能使用 *模組* 和 *ComputerName* 參數 **Get-process** 指令程式在相同的命令。

trans-unit.source: To get the modules that have been loaded by a process on a remote computer, use the **Invoke-Command** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得遠端電腦上的處理序所載入的模組，請使用 **Invoke-command** 指令程式。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is equivalent to getting the Modules property of each process object.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數相當於取得每個處理程序物件的 Module 屬性。

trans-unit.source: When you use this parameter, this cmdlet returns a **ProcessModule** object (System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule), not a process object.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用此參數時，此 cmdlet 會傳回 **ProcessModule** 物件 (System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule)，而不是程序物件。

trans-unit.source: So, you cannot pipe the output of the command to a cmdlet that expects a process object, such as Stop-Process.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您無法使用管線將命令的輸出傳送給預期取得處理程序物件的 Cmdlet，例如 Stop-Process。

trans-unit.source: When you use both the *Module* and *FileVersionInfo* parameters in the same command, this cmdlet returns a **FileVersionInfo** object with information about the file version of all modules.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用同時 *模組* 和 *FileVersionInfo* 在相同的命令參數，此 cmdlet 會傳回 **FileVersionInfo** 所有模組的檔案版本的相關資訊的物件。

trans-unit.source: -Name
trans-unit.target: -Name

trans-unit.source: Specifies one or more processes by process name.
trans-unit.target: 依處理程序名稱指定一個或多個處理程序。

trans-unit.source: You can type multiple process names (separated by commas) and use wildcard characters.
trans-unit.target: 您可以輸入多個處理程序名稱 (以逗號分隔) 及使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: The parameter name ("Name") is optional.
trans-unit.target: 參數名稱 ("Name") 為選擇性。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: System.Diagnostics.Process
trans-unit.target: System.Diagnostics.Process

trans-unit.source: You can pipe a process object to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過管道傳送到此指令程式的程序物件。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: System.Diagnostics.Process, System.Diagnotics.FileVersionInfo, System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule
trans-unit.target: System.Diagnostics.Process，System.Diagnotics.FileVersionInfo，System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule

trans-unit.source: By default, this cmdlet returns a **System.Diagnostics.Process** object.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此 cmdlet 會傳回 **System.Diagnostics.Process** 物件。

trans-unit.source: If you use the *FileVersionInfo* parameter, it returns a **System.Diagnotics.FileVersionInfo** object.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用 *FileVersionInfo* 參數，它會傳回 **System.Diagnotics.FileVersionInfo** 物件。

trans-unit.source: If you use the *Module* parameter, without the *FileVersionInfo* parameter, it returns a **System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule** object.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用 *模組* 參數，而不需要 *FileVersionInfo* 參數，它會傳回 **System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule** 物件。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: You can also refer to this cmdlet by its built-in aliases, ps and gps.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以內建的別名，ps 與 gps 參照到此指令程式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Aliases.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Aliases。

trans-unit.source: On computers that are running a 64-bit version of Windows, the 64-bit version of Windows PowerShell gets only 64-bit process modules and the 32-bit version of Windows PowerShell gets only 32-bit process modules.
trans-unit.target: 在執行 64 位元版本 Windows 的電腦上，64 位元版本的 Windows PowerShell 只會取得 64 位元的處理程序模組，而 32 位元版本的 Windows PowerShell 只會取得 32 位元的處理程序模組。

trans-unit.source: You can use the properties and methods of the Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) Win32_Process object in Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell 中，您可以使用 Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) Win32_Process 物件的方法與屬性。

trans-unit.source: For information, see Get-WmiObject and the WMI SDK.
trans-unit.target: 詳細資訊，請參閱 Get-wmiobject and WMI SDK。

trans-unit.source: The default display of a process is a table that includes the following columns.
trans-unit.target: 處理程序的預設顯示是一個包含下列欄位的表格。

trans-unit.source: For a description of all of the properties of process objects, see Process Propertieshttp://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=204482 at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=204482.
trans-unit.target: 所有的處理程序物件屬性的說明，請參閱在 http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=204482 Propertieshttp://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=204482 程序。

trans-unit.source: Handles: The number of handles that the process has opened.
trans-unit.target: 控制代碼︰ 處理序已開啟的控制代碼的數目。

trans-unit.source: NPM(K): The amount of non-paged memory that the process is using, in kilobytes.
trans-unit.target: NPM(K)︰ 使用此程序，以 kb 為單位的非分頁記憶體數量。

trans-unit.source: PM(K): The amount of pageable memory that the process is using, in kilobytes.
trans-unit.target: PM(K)︰ 使用此程序，以 kb 為單位的可分頁記憶體數量。

trans-unit.source: WS(K): The size of the working set of the process, in kilobytes.
trans-unit.target: WS(K)︰ 此程序，以 kb 為單位的工作集大小。

trans-unit.source: The working set consists of the pages of memory that were recently referenced by the process.
trans-unit.target: 工作集是由處理程序最近參照的記憶體分頁組成。

trans-unit.source: VM(M): The amount of virtual memory that the process is using, in megabytes.
trans-unit.target: VM(M)︰ 使用此程序，以 mb 為單位的虛擬記憶體量。

trans-unit.source: Virtual memory includes storage in the paging files on disk.
trans-unit.target: 虛擬記憶體包括磁碟上分頁檔案中的儲存體。

trans-unit.source: CPU(s): The amount of processor time that the process has used on all processors, in seconds.
trans-unit.target: CPU︰ 處理序已使用所有處理器，以秒為單位的處理器時間量。

trans-unit.source: ID: The process ID (PID) of the process.
trans-unit.target: 識別碼︰ 程序識別碼 (PID) 的程序。

trans-unit.source: ProcessName: The name of the process.
trans-unit.target: ProcessName︰ 程序的名稱。

trans-unit.source: For explanations of the concepts related to processes, see the Glossary in Help and Support Center and the Help for Task Manager.
trans-unit.target: 如需處理程序相關概念的說明，請參閱 [說明及支援中心] 中的 [詞彙] 和 [工作管理員] 的 [說明]。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the built-in alternate views of the processes available with Format-Table, such as StartTime and Priority, and you can design your own views.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用可用的處理程序的內建替代檢視格式資料表，例如開始時間和優先順序，以及您可以設計自己的檢視。

trans-unit.target: 相關的連結
